name: Library
longDes: You have entered a library. Some chairs and small tables face windows. There is a ^south window# and a ^west window#. There is a large ^bookcase# lining one wall. To the $North# is a door to a game room. The $East# door leads back to the foyer.
shortDes: You are in the mansion library. There is windows facing out, one ^south window# and a ^west window#. There is a massive ^bookcase# along one wall. A door to the $North# leads to the game room. There is also a doorway to the $East# that leads back to the foyer.

startingItems.name: book
startingItems.description:
The book falls open on a page. It appears to be written in some strange runic language.
A picture on one page shows a white rose splattered in red.
 On the next page is a gravestone.

features.name: bookcase
features.preActionDes: You see an oddly bound @book# on the shelf. It's upside down and has a strange binding.
features.inActionDes: You see an oddly bound book on the shelf. It's upside down and has a strange binding.
features.postActionDes: This is where you found the oddly bound book.

features.name: south window
features.preActionDes: You can see the porch from here, and front lawns beyond.

features.name: west window
features.preActionDes: You look at the forest West of the house. It goes for miles.
